attributes.action: accept these signatures as a Vote of No Confidence in the Government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the loss of 25million personal records and bank details, between HMRC and the NOA, together with other breaches of public security (theft of laptops etc.)We are calling for a vote of No Confidence in the Government.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
